```{r}
par(mfrow = c(1,2))

with(subset(ToothGrowth, supp == "OJ"),boxplot(len~dose , xlab = "Dose" , 
                                               ylab = "length of tooth" ,
                                               col = "orange" , main = "Orange juice")) 

with(subset(ToothGrowth, supp == "VC"),boxplot(len~dose , xlab = "Dose" , 
                                               ylab = "length of tooth" ,
                                               col = "blue" , main = "Vitamin C"))
```
